mapper.delete: delete from follow where active_mem_no =#{activeMemNo} and passive_mem_no=#{passiveMemNo}
mapper.select: select count(*) from follow where active_mem_no=#{activeMemNo} and passive_mem_no=#{passiveMemNo}
select count(passive_mem_no) from follow where passive_mem_no=#{memNo}
select count(active_mem_no) from follow where active_mem_no=#{memNo}
select count(review_no) from review where mem_no=#{memNo}

select M.mem_no mem_no, M.mem_nick mem_nick, PA.attach_no attach_no from( select passive_mem_no from follow where active_mem_no=#{memNo}) F left outer join mem M on F.passive_mem_no=M.mem_no left outer join profile_attach PA on F.passive_mem_no=PA.mem_no

select M.mem_no mem_no, M.mem_nick mem_nick, PA.attach_no attach_no from( select active_mem_no from follow where passive_mem_no=#{memNo}) F left outer join mem M on F.active_mem_no=M.mem_no left outer join profile_attach PA on F.active_mem_no=PA.mem_no
